name: Thirsty
description:
Presentation

Made in March 2018 for the Heart Jam by Heartbeast.

It was my first jam.

The theme was: Scarcity.

Tools

Gamemaker Studio: 2, Bfxr, Beesbusy.

Credits

Boss theme by www.bensound.com.

Windows fonts.

Gameplay

You must kill the boss but he is too strong for you and you don't even start with a damaging ability. You should gather items (search barrels for example) and gain abilities (drink living beings' blood) first.

- WASD or ZQSD or arrows for moving

- ESCAPE for pause

The other commands will be notified in-game when available.
